title: Bounty Hunter Trax45
author: Bounty Hunter Trax45
content: I am from the bounty hunter's community. I want to run bounty campaign social media with you. I have long experience. I have promoted many bounty campaigns before. I work differently from everyone but everyone likes my work. Everyone likes my media even though it is different according to everyone. If you want to know more about Bounty Campaign, ask me any questions. Meaning of Grace about a bounty campaign.Means Of Bounty :1. Twitter2.Facebook3.Telegram4.Instagram5.Discord6.Medium7.Reddit8.Article9.Tik Tok Video/ Youtube VideoContact My Telegram: https://t.me/bountyhuntertrax4Contact My Gmail _ bountyhuntertrax@gmail.com

comments.author: Orpichukwu
comments.body: Quote from: Bounty Hunter Trax45 on April 04, 2023, 09:05:27 PMBump You thread is less down 24hrs so bumping post will actually makes your thread spamming and as such might lead to deleting or account restrictions.

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: I will advise you get your self a copper member account so that you can post image here to make your thread look more nice.. Since you said you have experience on bounty management it will also be a added advantage if you add up some of your previous works so that your new clients can go through your portfolio. I doubt anyone will actually send you a DM on telegram or even email without any convincing information here, since the forum already have lots of experience managers, you need something that will also make you stand out.
